# Qit

![Qit: QoQa iOS Helpers and extensions](qit.png)

[![Build Status](https://github.com/qoqa/qit/workflows/Qit%20CI/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://https://github.com/qoqa/qit/actions)
[![swift-package-manager](https://img.shields.io/badge/package%20manager-compatible-brightgreen.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://github.com/apple/swift-package-manager)
[![swift-version](https://img.shields.io/badge/swift-5.3-brightgreen.svg)](https://github.com/apple/swift)

## Description

Qit is developed and owned by QoQa and provides helpers and classes' extensions.

## Installation

### Swift Package Manager

From Xcode 11, you can use [Swift Package Manager](https://swift.org/package-manager/)  to add Qit to your project.

* File > Swift Packages > Add Package Dependency
* Add `https://github.com/qoqa/qit`
* Select "Up to Next Major"
